data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Do I prefer to grow up and relate to life directly, or do I choose to live and die in fear?

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Like all explorers, we are drawn to discover what's out there without knowing yet if we have the courage to face it.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: When we protect ourselves so we won't feel pain, that protection becomes like armor, like armor that imprisons the softness of of the heart.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: We are all capable of becoming fundamentalists because we get addicted to other people's wrongness.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Rejoicing in ordinary things is not sentimental or trite. It actually takes guts. Each time we drop our complaints and allow everyday good fortune to inspire us, we enter the warrior's world.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: As long as our orientation is toward perfection or success, we will never learn about unconditional friendship with ourselves, nor will we find compassion.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: Without giving up hope—that there’s somewhere better to be, that there’s someone better to be—we will never relax with where we are or who we are.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: True compassion does not come from wanting to help out those less fortunate than ourselves but from realizing our kinship with all beings.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: The more we witness our emotional reactions and understand how they work, the easier it is to refrain.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.

data.author: Pema Chodron
data.quote: It's a transformative experience to simply pause instead of immediately fill up the space. By waiting, we begin to connect with fundamental restlessness as well as fundamental spaciousness.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: If my mind can concieve it, and my heart can believe it- then I can achieve it.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: What you are thinking is what you are becoming.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a Champion.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: What keeps me going is goals.

data.author: Muhammad Ali
data.quote: Impossible is nothing.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: If you need inspiring words, don't do it.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Continuous effort- not strength or intelligence is the key to unlocking our potential.

data.author: Virat Kohli
data.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
